entry.title: Current Conditions: Ice Crystals, -27.4°C

Visibility: 24.1 km

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 28 this evening and minus 39 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:00 PM EST Tuesday 21 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 18.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming west 20 km/h near noon. High minus 18. Wind chill minus 38 in the morning and minus 28 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:00 PM EST Tuesday 21 March 2023
